text: É zo Siɠɔɔl ɗɛi ma, é yeizu Ezipete yooi zu ʋele, Ekelɔn kwɛmaʋɛ lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu ɠɔʋɛzuʋɛ, naama adaʋɛ pɛ ka levezu ga Kanaan nuiti ta-yooi. Miná ɠa Filisiti nuiti ta-masada lɔɔlugɔiti ma laa wolaiti ti ná, Gaza, Asadɔde, Asekalɔn, Gate, ta Ekelɔn, ta Ava nuiti ta-yooi lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu yeezazuʋɛ.
